{"id":324154684,"lang":"python3","time":"1Â year, 3Â months","timestamp":1586778708,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"884 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/324154684/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Contiguous Array","memory":"21.4 MB","code":"from collections import defaultdict\nclass Solution:\n    def findMaxLength(self, nums):\n        sum2idx = defaultdict(list)\n        sum2idx[0].append(-1)\n        sum_val = 0\n        for idx, num in enumerate(nums):\n            if num == 0:\n                sum_val -= 1\n            else:\n                sum_val += 1\n            sum2idx[sum_val].append(idx)\n        ans = 0\n        for key in sum2idx.keys():\n            if len(sum2idx[key]) > 1:\n                ans = max(ans, sum2idx[key][-1] - sum2idx[key][0])\n        return ans\n        \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"contiguous-array"}
